Package manager

Class MapLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.MapLoader
  • public class MapLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to load maps from system files
    Author:
    psyfb2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MapLoader()
      Default Constructor, maxNumberOfGhosts is 5, ghostImageName = "./recources/images/ghost".

      Constructor

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapLoader

        public MapLoader()
        Default Constructor, maxNumberOfGhosts is 5, ghostImageName = "./recources/images/ghost".

      • MapLoader

        public MapLoader​(int maxNumberOfGhosts,
                 java.lang.String ghostImageName)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        ghostImageName - File name for ghost images excluding the ghost number. E.g. "./recources/images/ghost" will cause "./recources/images/ghost0.png", "./recources/images/ghost1.png", etc to get loaded
        maxNumberOfGhosts - How many ghost images there are with the base name given in ghostImageName variable. Ghost images should also be .png files.

    • Method Detail

      • loadMap

        public void loadMap​(java.lang.String fileName,
                    Maze maze,
                    java.util.Set<Cookie> cookieSet,
                    java.util.Set<Ghost> ghostSet,
                    Pacman pacman,
                    GameManager gameManager,
                    int ghostSpeed,
                    javafx.scene.paint.Color mazeColor)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a map from file then configures the maze, cookieSet, ghostSet and pacman to contain the correct information. Also encodes the map if it is not encoded using Run Length Encoding. Note: this method doesn't actually display anything.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Path to the file where the map is saved
        maze - Maze to store new BarObstacle objects
        cookieSet - CookieSet to store new Cookie objects
        ghostSet - GhostSet to store new Ghost objects
        pacman - Pacman to set it's x and y position
        gameManager - GameManager in which the entities are aggregated
        ghostSpeed - Speed of the ghosts (e.g. 5)
        mazeColor - Color of the BarObstacle objects which are added to the maze, null for a random color for each BarObstacle
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - File name not found or ghostImageName+ghostCounter provided in constructor not found
